provider.name: singleplatform
provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.

items.name: Shrimp Cocktail
items.description: Jumbo shrimp served with cocktail sauce

items.name: Smoked Salmon
items.description: Served on a blini with a dill crème fraiche

items.name: Deviled Eggs
items.description: Served with a dollop of caviar

items.name: Crab Salad
items.description: Jumbo lump crab salad, gently seasoned with tarragon in an heirloom cherry tomato half

items.name: Chicken Liver Pate
items.description: Topped with toasted pistachios on crostini

items.description: Served with a smooth mango puree

items.description: Marinated in turmeric, ginger and coconut milk and served with a sweet peanut sauce

items.name: Thai Chicken Meatballs
items.description: Seasoned with lemongrass, galangal, cilantro and mint, served with a spicy peanut sauce

items.name: Pepper Shooters
items.description: Mildly spicy cherry peppers stuffed with provolone and prosciutto

items.name: Speck
items.description: Crostini topped with pesto and speck, drizzled with olive oil

items.description: Toast points spread with foie gras and garnished with a tart cherry jam

items.name: Beef Satay
items.description: Marinated in turmeric, ginger, garlic and coconut milk and served with a sweet chili dipping sauce, garnished with cilantro

items.description: Medjool dates stuffed with marcona almonds and goats cheese, wrapped in prosciutto

items.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Cremini mushroom caps fi lled with fennel sausage and caramelized onions

items.name: Spanish Cheese
items.description: Perfect bites of manchego topped with membrillo and wrapped in prosciutto

items.description: 16 pieces each of california roll, salmon avocado roll & 8 pieces each of spicy tuna roll, triple vegetable roll
